testcase.name:
test_
id='C89243'
os=Alpine
'when capture(command) raises an exception, then the exception is untouched then nothing is logged'

test_
id='C89244'
os=Alpine
'when capture(command)'s status is zero, it logs nothing, it returns [stdout,stderr,status],'

test_
id='C89245'
os=Alpine
'when capture(command)'s status is non-zero, it does not raise, it logs [command,stdout,stderr,status], it returns [stdout,stderr,status],'
